title: Ep. 35 - Suck Sites
description:
On today’s show, the guys welcome Jace into the office, the winner of the Nick Maraldo job shadow during the GROAT as they try to get to the bottom of Suck Site Gate, as someone hacked into Gorms’ computer and loaded it with “Suck Sites," while he was away. He believes Digs is starting to act like a Don around the office, Digs has  a different message. The guys also debut a new segment dealing with notes from El Chapo's trial, but get some hazy and confusing information. They also play "Dead or Alive," with Gorman and a little fact or fiction. Todd wants to know how many guys in the office it would take to take out Brock Lesnar is a UFC-type sanctioned match, if it's even possible. They also answer some listener questions, including what the worst job to be hungover for is, and what job they would assign to everyone as a punishment for a full 40 hour work week. They also discuss some of the things they miss while on their diets for the weight loss challenge, and end the show with a few vitamin thoughts. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and GROAT winner @JGrosjean4), and closes with Houston(Fornication) by Travi$ Scott
dc:creator: The Pod
